content: here's a tub Oh dinos that I got it was five bucks for this container and it's
got a lot of stuff in it you can see it's got some other plants and fence and
rocks but I'm mostly just interested in dinos but I can use this for other stuff
so sort out the rocks use those for another craft don't really need the
fences but I could use it for some other craft project and they also have some
plants so I'll use I might use those for something else also before you use these
these dinos you want to make sure to wash them and soap and water okay now
I've got my Dino just washed with soap and water I'll dry it off now I'm going
to put them on some bases so there's some options you could use a wooden bit
shapes you get at the craft store just glue that on with the goop hit the feet
put it on and you'll be good to go another option could be washers okay and
I try to get the ones with the smallest hole in the center but you can also hide
that hole by using a glue gun and just kind of put a squirt in there let it
harden up and then glue your Dino to it those are some cheap options what I
usually use though are these gale force nine bases I really like them I do use
some magnetic stuff in my game so you like these but they have a slot these
particular ones have a slot so you can just cover that up with a hot glue gun
before you put the guy on so just the same as before just glue his feet put
them right on and they'll be ready for flocking and painting so there we go so
here's a setup I did with some of the ones I have finished I flocked the bases
painted them spray paint in black of course then painted them here's a here's
Roderick for scale and let me give you a closer look for a nice little cheap
diner that's got some pretty good detail on it and I just hit it with like a
grayish color a little bit of white on the belly dirt on the base and I'm good
to go of course Roger can't have anything
living next to him so yeah I know so of course he's got the arrest of the pack
to deal with now so here's another scene I've set up and this had a bunch of
pterodactyls in it or Terra Don's and yeah there's a scale really cool looking
let me give you a closer look here so I painted those up a different color or
like a muddy orange so it flies back in here's a here's a plastic stand if you
see my flight video see how I do the flying creatures put them on these
plastic stands they work fantastic there you go
